IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF HIGHLAND COMMUNITY FOUNDATION IS TO PROVIDE SUPPORT THAT HELPS ADVANCE THE MISSION OF HIGHLAND COMMUNITY COLLEGE.
IRS990.Desc: GRANTS TO HIGHLAND COMMUNITY COLLEGE AND SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATION THAT IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AS OTHER THAN A PRIVATE FOUNDATION, A CHARITABLE GROUP NOT ORGANIZED FOR PROFIT. ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAX EXPENSE IS INCLUDED IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE FOUNDATION EVALUATES THEIR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, AND THERE HAVE BEEN NO RECORDED UNCERTAIN TAX PORTIONS RECORDED IN 2023 AND 2022. THEREFORE, NO PROVISION OR LIABILITY FOR INCOME TAXES HAS BEEN INCLUDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE FOUNDATION FILES VARIOUS FEDERAL OR STATE NON-PROFIT TAX RETURNS. THE FOUNDATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO U.S. FEDERAL OR STATE EXAMINATIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR TAX YEARS PRIOR TO 2019.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN TRUSTS 23,114. CHANGE IN VALUE OF CHARITABLE REMAINDER ANNUITY TRUSTS 834.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORT FOR PROGRAMS & CAPITAL EXPENSES OF COLLEGE

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCHOLARSHIP ENDOWMENTS ARE A MINIMUM OF $25,000, IN WHICH A SEPARATE NAMED SCHOLARSHIP ACCOUNT IS OPENED AND MONTHLY STATEMENTS ARE RECEIVED. THE CRITERIA FOR THE SCHOLARSHIP IS DETERMINED BY THE DONOR WHO APPROVES THE SCHOLARSHIP APPLICATION. THE AWARD IS BASED ON AVAILABLE INCOME OR A STATED AMOUNT AND THE RECIPIENTS ARE SELECTED BY A COMMITTEE ADHERING TO CRITERIA AND QUALIFICATIONS OF THE STUDENT'S APPLICATION. SEPARATE SPREADSHEETS ARE IN PLACE FOR EACH SCHOLARSHIP AND THE NAME OF THE STUDENT/RECIPIENT AND THE AMOUNT OF THE AWARD AS WELL AS ANY ADDITIONAL FUNDS DONATED ARE MAINTAINED ANNUALLY. SOME PROCESS HOLDS TRUE FOR ONE-TIME MEMORIAL GIFTS FOR SCHOLARSHIPS. THE PROCESS OF PROVIDING FUNDING TO THE COLLEGE IS BASED ON DONOR'S GIFT AND TRACKED IN RAISERS EDGE/BLACKBAUD. THE FOUNDATION EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND DIRECTOR OF OPERATIONS MEET SEVERAL TIMES A YEAR WITH THE PRESIDENT OF THE COLLEGE AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER TO REVIEW THE ANNUAL PLEDGES AND GIFTS FROM DONORS AND PROVIDE REPORTS WITH FUNDING RESTRICTED TO CERTAIN COLLEGE PROGRAMS/DEPARTMENTS. IF FUNDS ARE UNRESTRICTED THE COLLEGE, IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE FOUNDATION, DETERMINE THE COLLEGE GREATEST NEEDS. THE FUNDS ARE ANNUALLY TRANSFERRED FROM THE FOUNDATION TO THE COLLEGE BY JUNE 30TH.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 WILL BE DISTRIBUTED TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HIGHLAND COMMUNITY COLLEGE FOUNDATION HAS UTILIZED PUBLICLY AVAILABLE DATA, A REVIEW PROVIDED BY A THIRD PARTY CONSULTANT, AND MARKET DATA SHARED BY OUR PARTNER COLLEGE TO IDENTIFY IF CURRENT AND FUTURE POSTED POSITIONS ARE EQUITABLY COMPENSATED IN ALIGNMENT WITH COMPARABLE PEER ORGANIZATIONS. THIS REVIEW WAS CONDUCTED AS RECENT AS JUNE OF 2022 AND DATA WAS PROVIDED FOR CONSIDERATION OF THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE FOUNDATION BOARD. MOST RECENTLY COMPENSATION WAS REVIEWED THROUGH AN AD HOC COMMITTEE FOR A POSITION TO BE POSTED IN THE NEAR FUTURE. COMPENSATION RECOMMENDATIONS ARE BASED ON THIS THIRD PARTY DATA PROVIDED FROM AN INDEPENDENT ORGANIZATION AND IS APPROVED BY RELEVANT MEMBERS OF THE FOUNDATION BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION FOLLOWS THE RULES & REGULATIONS OF THE IRS REGARDING PUBLIC AVAILABILITY OF FORM 990 AS WELL AS ANY OTHER REQUIRED DOCUMENTS. THE FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AT THE FOUDNATION'S OFFICE.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN TRUSTS -23,114. CHANGE IN VALUE OF CHARITABLE REMAINDER ANNUITY TRUSTS -834.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART V, LINE 2A & PART VII
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL FORM W-2S ARE ISSUED BY HIGHLAND COMMUNITY COLLEGE. THE FOUNDATION REIMBURSES THE COLLEGE FOR ALL SALARY/WAGE EXPENSES INCURRED.
